SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bowels or almost had an accident?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BWCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bowels

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bowel control problems?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BWCS - Altered Activities Because Bowel Control Problems

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you been constipated?
Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bowel problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BWCS - Bowel Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bowels or had an accident?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: BWCS - Lost Control of Your Bowels
